mapper.insert: insert into article(member_id, title, content, directory_uuid, views, article_type, address, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by) values (#{memberId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{directoryUUID}, #{views}, #{articleType}, #{address}, #{createdAt}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedAt}, #{updatedBy});
mapper.select: select id, member_id, title, content, views, address, type, directory_uuid, created_at, updated_at, created_by, updated_by from article where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update article set member_id = #{memberId}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, directory_uuid = #{directoryUUID}, views = #{views}, type = #{articleType}, address = #{address}, updated_at = #{updatedAt}, updated_by = #{updatedBy} where id = #{id};
